original_text: By faith Enoch was taken from this life, so that he did not experience death: “He could not be found, because God had taken him away.” For before he was taken, he was commended as one who pleased God.
korean_text: 믿음으로 에녹은 죽음을 보지 않고 옮겨졌으니 하나님이 그를 옮기심으로 다시 보이지 아니하였느니라 그는 옮겨지기 전에 하나님을 기쁘시게 하는 자라 하는 증거를 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: By faith Enoch was taken from this life,
so that he did not experience death:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽음을 경험하지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: because God had taken him away.
he was commended as one who pleased God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님을 기쁘시게 하는 자로 칭찬을 받았더라
